=== Vim ===
* CTRL_o+o - Magic! The most recent file you edited opened!
* gi - Jump to last editing position
* CTRL_V+SHIFT_G+g+CTRL_A - create a sequence of numbers (detail: https://twitter.com/MasteringVim/status/1262100964317827072 )
